sentences.sContent: If your child regresses to babyish behaviour, all you know for certain is that the child is under stress.
sentences.sCn: 如果你的孩子退步到幼稚的行为，你可以肯定的是孩子正处在压力之下。

remMethod.val: re (向后) + gress (行走) → 向后走 → 使倒退

trans.tranCn: 复原； 逆行； 使倒退
trans.tranOther: When people or things regress, they return to an earlier and less advanced stage of development
